trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含與工作流程執行個體終止相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]執行階段追蹤基礎結構，終止工作流程執行個體時，會產生 TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>相關聯的執行個體包含與工作流程<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>，工作流程追蹤基礎結構放在 TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>中<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>針對它傳送至追蹤服務。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體可能在三種方式之一終止︰ 主機呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>;<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>活動可能會從叫用工作流程執行個體; 內，或可能發生未處理的例外狀況。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機終止工作流程或<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>活動時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>至<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>具有其<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定為終止原因描述。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果因為未處理的例外狀況而終止工作流程，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會傳遞<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>的未處理的例外狀況

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs 僅供執行階段追蹤服務資訊傳入<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致工作流程執行個體終止的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為未處理的例外狀況而終止工作流程執行個體，當未處理的例外狀況包含例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: 當主機呼叫以終止工作流程執行個體<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>活動，例外狀況包含<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>具有其<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性設定為終止原因描述。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機終止工作流程執行個體，它會提供這項描述中的`string` <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; 如果工作流程執行個體便會終止<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>，描述由<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所提供</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的參數

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>導致終止工作流程執行個體。
